servers.name: Hytale Box
servers.description: Fully customized Spanish-speaking server with unique world, special progression, custom systems and active community.

servers.name: Hylanders
servers.description: Bridge between classic Minecraft and Hytale. Ultimate meeting point for block lovers and adventure seekers.

servers.name: DreamTale Vanilla
servers.description: Vanilla server with chill and experienced staff team. 5+ years experience providing quality gameplay.

servers.name: Hylife
servers.description: Medieval Low Fantasy Roleplay project focused on worldbuilding and long-term RP. Building foundation and seeking motivated collaborators.

servers.name: Mythlane
servers.description: Cozy RPG server with quests, dungeons, and collaborative building. Bilingual community (EN/FR).

servers.name: Hyzen
servers.description: Survival RPG server focused on stability, progression, and community. Regional realms (LATAM & Europe) with clear roadmap.

servers.name: Hoodexia
servers.description: Spanish Hytale server with Survival, PvE and PvP. Daily events, economy, clans, rewards, progression, 24/7 staff.

servers.name: Hyperion Online Anarchy
servers.description: Day 1 Hytale anarchy server with no rules and no resets. True vanilla anarchy experience.

servers.name: Hynetic
servers.description: Modern Hytale minigame network featuring SkyWars, SurvivalGames, and BedWars. Clean gameplay and fair mechanics.

servers.name: Horizons SMP
servers.description: Brand new Day-1 Hytale SMP (Jan 13th). Friendly, community-driven place to explore Hytale at launch.

servers.name: HytaleArgentum
servers.description: Argentine server with 0 ping advantage for local players. Focus on community and accessibility.

servers.name: Hylore
servers.description: Upcoming anarchy server for players who crave freedom and chaos. True anarchy with no rules, resets, or hand-holding.

servers.name: VoxelMC.de
servers.description: Classic minigames on Hytale: Bedwars, Skywars, KitPVP, BuildFFA, JumpOut and more with Hytale items.

servers.name: Mythale
servers.description: Spanish server focused on clans and community. Create a clan with friends and become a legend.

servers.name: Hytale Hispano
servers.description: Largest Spanish Hytale community server with fully polished survival world. Active Discord community.

servers.name: HytaleCorner
servers.description: Multi-mode server featuring minigames, factions-style gameplay, PvP and connected hubs for all player types.

servers.name: Arconi
servers.description: Next generation of Hytale servers. Reborn in 2026. Launching January 13th.

servers.name: 2B2H
servers.description: Hytale survival anarchy server with world that never resets. PvP enabled in free-for-all no rules environment.

servers.name: HytaleVanilla
servers.description: Growing launch community for upcoming Hytale server. Join others interested in playing together on day one.

servers.name: Hybase
servers.description: German-speaking Hytale server with motivated players building something great. PvP, minigames, and community-driven development.
